N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 791.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) For purposes of
this Part, construction shall mean a change in a hospice's geographic service
area, the erection, building or substantial acquisition or alteration of a
hospice inpatient facility or unit, hospice residence or equipment, or a
substantial change in the method of providing hospice inpatient or hospice
residence services. (b) For
purposes of this Part, total project cost shall mean total costs for
construction contracts, if any, including, but not limited to costs for
demolition work, site preparation, actual construction and contingencies, total
costs for real property, for fixed and movable equipment, architectural and/or
engineering fees, construction loan interest costs, and other financing, professional and ancillary fees, charges and allowances. Such costs shall
include the cost of all capital items associated with an acquisition, lease
arrangement and/or construction. If any acquisition is to be effectuated
through a leasing arrangement or by a donation, the relevant cost shall be the
cost of the asset if purchased. Notes
